mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, CATENAME, CATECODE, CATECODEREF FROM GOODS_CATEGORY START WITH CATECODEREF IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CATECODE = CATECODEREF
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes,gdsImg,gdsThumbImg) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes},#{gdsImg},#{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: SELECT G.GDSNUM, G.GDSNAME, G.CATECODE, C.CATECODEREF, C.CATENAME, GDSPRICE, GDSSTOCK, GDSDES, GDSIMG, GDSDATE, G.GDSIMG, G.GDSTHUMBIMG FROM TBL_GOODS G INNER JOIN GOODS_CATEGORY C ON G.CATECODE = C.CATECODE ORDER BY GDSNUM DESC

SELECT G.GDSNUM, G.GDSNAME, G.CATECODE, C.CATECODEREF, C.CATENAME, GDSPRICE, GDSSTOCK, GDSDES, GDSIMG, GDSDATE, G.GDSIMG, G.GDSTHUMBIMG FROM TBL_GOODS G INNER JOIN GOODS_CATEGORY C ON G.CATECODE = C.CATECODE WHERE G.GDSNUM=#{GDSNUM}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_GOODS SET GDSNAME = #{gdsName}, CATECODE = #{cateCode}, GDSPRICE = #{gdsPrice}, GDSSTOCK = #{gdsStock}, GDSDES = #{gdsDes},
gdsImg = #{gdsImg}, gdsThumbImg = #{gdsThumbImg} WHERE GDSNUM = ${gdsNum}
mapper.select: SELECT orderid, userid, orderrec, useraddr1, useraddr2, useraddr3, orderphon, amount, orderdate, DELIVERY FROM tbl_order

SELECT O.ORDERID, O.USERID, O.ORDERREC, O.USERADDR1, O.USERADDR2, O.USERADDR3, O.ORDERPHON, O.AMOUNT, O.ORDERDATE, O.DELIVERY, D.GDSNUM, D.CARTSTOCK, D.ORDERDETAILSNUM, G.GDSNAME, G.GDSTHUMBIMG, G.GDSPRICE FROM tbl_order o INNER JOIN tbl_order_details d ON o.orderid = d.orderid INNER JOIN tbl_goods g ON d.gdsnum = g.gdsnum WHERE O.ORDERID=#{orderId}
